analysis.description:
Tokensale.close (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol)

LockinManager.ifInAllowedLocks (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#549-553) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allowedLocks[_days] == 0

LockinManager.ifInAllowedLocks (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#549-553) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allowedLocks[_days] == 0
LockinManager.removeAllowedLock (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#567-576) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allowedLocks[_day] == 0

LockinManager.ifInAllowedLocks (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#549-553) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allowedLocks[_days] == 0
LockinManager.removeAllowedLock (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#567-576) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allowedLocks[_day] == 0
LockinManager.removeValidContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#592-602) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allowedContracts[_address] == 0

Reentrancy in Token.destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#852-868):
	External calls:
	- balance = availableBalance(_investor) (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#859)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#862-864)

Reentrancy in Tokensale.processBTCTransaction (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#955-983):
	External calls:
	- token.mintTokens(ethereumAddress,tokensPurchased) (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#975-977)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in Token.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#704-723):
	External calls:
	- availableBalance(_from) >= _amount && allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to].add(_amount) > balances[_to] (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#709-722)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#715-719)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#715)

Token.availableBalance has external calls inside a loop:
	- lockinManager.getLocksUnlockDate(_owner,i) > now (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#653-657)

Token.availableBalance has external calls inside a loop:
	- _value = lockinManager.getLocksAmount(_owner,i) (/unique_chucks/6/0x311d745582a97be5d7abbce48855ecec72737c5d.sol#655)
